verbose_text: HbA1c levels predict incident diabetes, and lifestyle and metformin intervention reduced incident diabetes according to HbA1c defined in DPP.34 The subgroup analysis of the Zensharen study showed that the HR for developing diabetes reduced to 0.41 among IGT subjects, and to 0.24 among those with a higher baseline HbA1c.35 In the JDPP study, the mean follow-up was 2.3 years.
